title: naija-faker
description: Nigerian data faker library - generates fake Nigerian names, addresses, phone numbers, emails, and more. All data is culturally authentic, covering Yoruba, Igbo, and Hausa ethnic groups.

methods.name: config
methods.description: Set default configuration for all subsequent data generation calls. Persists language, gender, and network preferences.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Configuration object

language.description: Default Nigerian language/ethnicity for name generation

gender.description: Default gender for name and title generation

network.description: Default mobile network provider for phone numbers

returns.description: Sets internal defaults, no return value

methods.name: name
methods.description: Generate a fake Nigerian full name (first name + last name) from the specified or random ethnic group.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Nigerian language/ethnicity. Random if not specified.

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Gender for gendered first names. Random if not specified.

methods.name: person
methods.description: Generate a complete fake Nigerian person with title, name, email, phone, and address.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Nigerian language/ethnicity for the person's name

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Gender for name and title

returns.description: Person object with keys: title, firstName, lastName, fullName, email, phone, address

methods.name: people
methods.description: Generate an array of fake Nigerian persons. Each person has complete identity data.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Number of people to generate. Defaults to 10.

methods.name: title
methods.description: Generate a Nigerian title/honorific. Includes culturally significant titles like Chief, Alhaji, Oba, Emir, Igwe.

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Gender-specific title. Random if not specified.

methods.name: email
methods.description: Generate a fake email address, optionally based on a provided name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name to base the email on. If not provided, a random name is used.

methods.name: address
methods.description: Generate a fake Nigerian street address with number, name, type, and city.

methods.name: phoneNumber
methods.description: Generate a fake Nigerian phone number in +234 international format.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Mobile network provider. Random if not specified.

methods.name: states
methods.description: Get all 37 Nigerian states (36 states + Federal Capital Territory).

methods.name: lgas
methods.description: Get all 774 Nigerian Local Government Areas (LGAs).

methods.name: seed
methods.description: Set a seed for deterministic output. All subsequent calls will produce identical results for the same seed. Call without arguments to reset to non-deterministic mode.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Seed number. Omit to reset to random.

methods.name: bvn
methods.description: Generate a fake 11-digit Bank Verification Number (BVN).

methods.name: nin
methods.description: Generate a fake 11-digit National Identification Number (NIN).

methods.name: bankAccount
methods.description: Generate a fake Nigerian bank account with bank name, CBN code, and 10-digit NUBAN account number.

parameters.name: bankName
parameters.description: Specific bank name (e.g., 'Zenith Bank'). Random if not specified.

returns.description: Bank account object with bankName, bankCode, accountNumber

methods.name: consistentPerson
methods.description: Generate a geographically consistent fake Nigerian person. Name ethnicity, title, address, state, and LGA are all coherent.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Nigerian language/ethnicity. Random if not specified.

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Gender for name and title.

returns.description: ConsistentPerson with title, name, email, phone, address, state, lga — all geographically coherent

methods.name: consistentPeople
methods.description: Generate multiple geographically consistent fake Nigerian persons.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Number of people to generate. Defaults to 10.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Nigerian language/ethnicity for all people.

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Gender for all people.

methods.name: licensePlate
methods.description: Generate a fake Nigerian license plate number in STATE-DIGITS+LETTERS format.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State name for plate prefix. Random if not specified.

methods.name: company
methods.description: Generate a fake Nigerian company with name, RC number, and industry.

methods.name: university
methods.description: Generate a random Nigerian university with name, abbreviation, state, and type.

methods.name: educationRecord
methods.description: Generate a fake education record with university, degree, course, and graduation year.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Filter universities by region matching this language.

methods.name: workRecord
methods.description: Generate a fake work/employment record with company, position, industry, and start year.

methods.name: vehicleRecord
methods.description: Generate a fake vehicle ownership record with license plate, make, model, year, and color.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State for license plate prefix.

methods.name: detailedPerson
methods.description: Generate a detailed fake Nigerian person with geographic consistency plus education, work, and vehicle records.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language/ethnicity.

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Gender.

methods.name: detailedPeople
methods.description: Generate multiple detailed fake Nigerian persons.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Count. Defaults to 10.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language/ethnicity.

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Gender.

methods.name: dateOfBirth
methods.description: Generate a fake date of birth with age, configurable via minAge and maxAge.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: { minAge?: number, maxAge?: number }. Defaults to 18–65.

methods.name: maritalStatus
methods.description: Generate a random marital status.

returns.description: Single, Married, Divorced, Widowed, or Separated

methods.name: bloodGroup
methods.description: Generate a random blood group.

returns.description: Blood group e.g. O+, A-, AB+

methods.name: genotype
methods.description: Generate a random genotype (AA, AS, AC, SS, SC).

methods.name: salary
methods.description: Generate a fake salary in NGN with level-based income bands.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: { level?: 'entry'|'mid'|'senior'|'executive' }

methods.name: nextOfKin
methods.description: Generate a fake next of kin with name, relationship, phone, and address.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language/ethnicity.

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Gender of the kin.

methods.name: export
methods.description: Export generated data as JSON or CSV string. Supports person, detailedPerson, and consistentPerson types.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of person to generate. Default: person.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of records. Default: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Output format. Default: json.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Get API schema for AI/LLM tool integration. Returns structured descriptions of all available methods.

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: Specific method name to describe. Returns all methods if not specified.

returns.description: Array of method schemas, a single method schema, or null if method not found
